title: Governor Signs Bill to Preserve Access to Specialty Care for Medically Fragile Children
text: SACRAMENTO, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Gov Brown signs AB 187 (Bonta). A critical measure extending the life of the California Childrenâ€™s Services (CCS) program, which are used by 180K medically fragile children. ...
